title.rendered: True Wireless Earbuds Bluetooth Stereo Earphones Touch Control Headphones with Charging Case Microphone Waterproof…

content.rendered:
Wireless Earbuds

COMFORTABLE WEARING AND SNUG FIT

The look and structural design of the wi-fi Bluetooth earbuds conforms to ergonomics. And the sporting methodology and construction dimension extra appropriate for European ears are designed.

THE MOST ADVANCED BLUETOOTH 5.0 TECHNOLOGY

Bluetooth 5.0 expertise makes the connection extra steady and the sound delay has improved. This Bluetooth headset gives quicker information transmission velocity and decrease energy consumption.

NOISE REDUCTION TECHNOLOGY

HiFi stereo sound high quality, you’ll be able to hearken to music anytime and wherever. During a name, it will possibly scale back ambient noise and let others hear clear voice messages.

Read more

PACKAGE INCLUDES

1 x Pair True Wireless Earbuds (left&proper)

3 x Pair Silicone Earmuffs (S,M,L)

1 x Portable Charging Case

1 x USB Charging Cable

1 x User Manual

STYLISH DESIGN & LIGHTWEIGHT

There are two colours and 4 kinds so that you can select. Stylish look, simple to hold.

SUITABLE FOR WEARING IN MANY SPORTS

This wi-fi earphones is appropriate for answering the telephone whereas driving, making certain the protection of driving, and appropriate for a wide range of sports activities, comparable to strolling, operating, climbing and snowboarding.

Read more

Specification:

Bluetooth Version: 5.0+ERD

Chipset: JL6936

Playing Time: 6-7 hours

Battery: Polymer Lithium Battery

Earbuds Size: 1.9cm * 4.2cm

Battery Capacity of Portable Charging Case : 300-400mAH

Battery Capacity of Single Earbud: 50mAH

Operation Range: 10-15 meters

Charging Time: 1 hour

Standby Time: 60 hours

Product Features

1. Dual-mode Bluetooth V5.0+EDR with extremely low energy consumption.

2. Auto energy on/off and one-step pairing.

3. Unbreakable connectivity

4. Up to 20-hours playtime.

5. IPX4 waterproof design

6. Built-in microphone

7. Stereo handsfree calls

8. HIFI sound results, help lossless music transmission

9. CVC8.0 noise cancellation

10. Activating Siri

11. Comfortable Wearing

12. Compatible with most machine with Bluetooth perform.

13. Strong and steady connection with superior Bluetooth 5.0 expertise.

Note:

1. Please deal with with care, earbuds needs to be saved in a cool and dry place, steer clear of excessive temperature and excessive humidity setting.

2.Please use these earbuds below their working vary(33ft /10m), and be sure that there is no such thing as a impediment between the linked gadgets and earphones.

Make certain this suits by coming into your mannequin quantity.
1.【HiFi Stereo HD Sound】: The wi-fi bluetooth earbuds supply a really high-quality sound and highly effective bass efficiency with charging field. Wireless Stereo that includes superior Bluetooth 5.0 expertise and state-of-the-art acoustic parts that produce unbelievable sound high quality with deep bass and crystal clear treble.
2. 【Touch Control Operation & One Step Pairing】: TWS earbuds can supply sturdy and steady connection. They will join one another robotically once you take them out of the charging case.
3.【How to Use】: Double-click to pause / play, triple-click the left to change to the earlier track, triple-click the suitable to change to the subsequent track, and brief press for 3 seconds to name the Siri voice assistant.
4.【Ergonomic Design & Longer Enjoyment】: Can be used for 4-5 hours when the earbuds are absolutely charged, then enhance that to 20-hour with the included charging case. Take one wi-fi headphone for Mono mode and go away one other earbud charging, lengthen your playtime from 20 hours to 30 hours. These wi-fi earbuds can deliver prolonged playtime.
5. 【Bring You a Great Wearing Experience】: The Bluetooth earphone can successfully scale back the radiation, and now not want to carry the cell phone to reply the decision, and it additionally reduces the danger of the cell phone falling. In addition, with this Bluetooth headset, you’ll not miss any calls. Perfect for sports activities, operating, jogging, fitness center train, audiobooks, watching TV, and listening to music.
